languages.text: {n}Все пространство вокруг заполняет скрежет и треск, льющиеся из каждого вокса и рупора. После чего слышится глубокий мужской голос.{/n} "Запрос: приглашение на орбитальный пост фон Валанциус. Загрузка координат в центральный когитатор шаттла... Завершена. Цель: финализация протокола "Забвение". {n}Невидимый собеседник заходится липким, булькающим кашлем.{/n} "Поспеши, отпрыск... Будешь медлить — взлетишь на воздух вместе с лишними объектами".

{n}The space around you suddenly fills with screeches and crackles that pour from every vox-caster and speaker. Then, you hear a deep male voice:{/n} "Query: invitation to the von Valancius orbital station. Uploading coordinates into the shuttle's central cogitator... complete. Purpose: finalising the Oblivion directive." {n}The voice goes into a guttural, gurgling cough.{/n} "Tarry not, offspring... If you delay, you will be blown up along with all the extraneous subjects."
languages.original_text: {n}Все пространство вокруг заполняет скрежет и треск, льющиеся из каждого вокса и рупора. После чего слышится глубокий мужской голос.{/n} "Запрос: приглашение на орбитальный пост фон Валанциус. Загрузка координат в центральный когитатор шаттла... Завершена. Цель: финализация протокола "Забвение". {n}Невидимый собеседник заходится липким, булькающим кашлем.{/n} "Поспеши, отпрыск... Будешь медлить — взлетишь на воздух вместе с лишними объектами".

traits.locale_text: {n}The space around is filled with screeching and crackling, pouring from every vox-caster and mouthpiece. Then a deep male voice is heard.{/n} "Query: invitation to the von Valancius orbital station. Uploading coordinates into the shuttle's central cogitator... Complete. Objective: finalizing the Oblivion protocol. {n}The invisible caller goes into a guttural, gurgling cough.{/n} "Tarry not, scion... If you delay, you will get blown up with the extraneous subjects."

Objective: finalizing the Oblivion protocol. {n}The invisible caller goes into a guttural, gurgling cough.{/n} "Tarry not, scion... If you delay, you will get blown up with the extraneous subjects."

Objective: finalising the Oblivion protocol. {n}The invisible caller goes into a guttural, gurgling cough.{/n} "Tarry not, scion... If you delay, you will be blown up along with the extraneous subjects."

Purpose: finalising the Oblivion directive." {n}The voice goes into a guttural, gurgling cough.{/n} "Tarry not, offspring... If you delay, you will be blown up along with all the extraneous subjects."

languages.text: {n}El espacio a tu alrededor se llena inmediatamente de chirridos y restallidos de cada voco amplificador y altavoz. Después, oyes la voz grave de un hombre:{/n} «Asunto: invitación a la estación orbital von Valancius. Subiendo coordenadas al cogitador central de la lanzadera... completado. Motivación: finalizar la directiva Olvido». {n}La voz produce una tos gutural y gorgoteante.{/n} «No te entretengas, descendiente... Si te retrasas, explotarás junto con todos los demás sujetos».
languages.original_text: {n}The space around you suddenly fills with screeches and crackles that pour from every vox-caster and speaker. Then, you hear a deep male voice:{/n} "Query: invitation to the von Valancius orbital station. Uploading coordinates into the shuttle's central cogitator... complete. Purpose: finalising the Oblivion directive." {n}The voice goes into a guttural, gurgling cough.{/n} "Tarry not, offspring... If you delay, you will be blown up along with all the extraneous subjects."

traits.locale_text: {n}El espacio a tu alrededor se llena inmediatamente de chirridos y restallidos de cada voco amplificador y altavoz. Después, oyes la voz grave de un hombre:{/n} «Asunto: invitación a la estación orbital von Valancius. Subiendo coordenadas al cogitador central de la lanzadera... completado. Motivación: finalizar la directiva Olvido». {n}La voz produce una tos gutural y gorgoteante.{/n} «No te entretengas, descendiente... Si te retrasas, explotarás junto con todos los demás sujetos».

languages.text: {n}突然之间，你周围所有的音阵装置与扬声器都发出了刺耳的尖啸声与噼啪声。随后，一个低沉的男声开了口。{/n}“事项：邀请目标前往冯·瓦兰修斯王朝轨道星站。正在将坐标上传至穿梭机的中央沉思者……操作完成。目标：执行最终确认，启动湮灭指令。”{n}随后，这个声音变成了喉音般的咳嗽声。{/n}“抓紧时间，孩子……若是继续拖延下去，你就会和所有无关紧要的臣民一起灰飞烟灭。”
languages.original_text: {n}The space around you suddenly fills with screeches and crackles that pour from every vox-caster and speaker. Then, you hear a deep male voice:{/n} "Query: invitation to the von Valancius orbital station. Uploading coordinates into the shuttle's central cogitator... complete. Purpose: finalising the Oblivion directive." {n}The voice goes into a guttural, gurgling cough.{/n} "Tarry not, offspring... If you delay, you will be blown up along with all the extraneous subjects."

traits.locale_text: {n}突然之间，你周围所有的音阵装置与扬声器都发出了刺耳的尖啸声与噼啪声。随后，一个低沉的男声开了口。{/n}“事项：邀请目标前往冯·瓦兰修斯王朝轨道星站。正在将坐标上传至穿梭机的中央沉思者……操作完成。目标：执行最终确认，启动湮灭指令。”{n}随后，这个声音变成了喉音般的咳嗽声。{/n}“抓紧时间，孩子……若是继续拖延下去，你就会和所有无关紧要的臣民一起灰飞烟灭。”
{n}突然之间，你周围所有的音阵装置与扬声器都发出了刺耳的尖啸声与噼啪声。随后，一个低沉的男声开了口。{/n}“事项：邀请目标前往冯·瓦兰修斯王朝轨道星站。正在将坐标上传至穿梭机的中央沉思者……操作完成。目标：执行最终确认，启动湮灭协议。”{n}随后，这个声音变成了喉音般的咳嗽声。{/n}“抓紧时间，孩子……若是继续拖延下去，你就会和所有无关紧要的臣民一起灰飞烟灭。”

languages.text: {n}突然、周りの空間があらゆる音声通信送受信装置とスピーカーから注がれる金切り声とパチパチという音で満たされる。そして、低い男の声が聞こえる。{/n}「クエリ：フォン・ヴァランシウス軌道ステーションへの招待。シャトル中央考算機への座標アップロード中…完了。目的：滅却指令の完了」{n}声はしわがれ声になり、ゴボゴボという咳になる。{/n}「我が子よ、遅れるな…遅れれば、余計なものすべてと一緒に爆発することになるだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}The space around you suddenly fills with screeches and crackles that pour from every vox-caster and speaker. Then, you hear a deep male voice:{/n} "Query: invitation to the von Valancius orbital station. Uploading coordinates into the shuttle's central cogitator... complete. Purpose: finalising the Oblivion directive." {n}The voice goes into a guttural, gurgling cough.{/n} "Tarry not, offspring... If you delay, you will be blown up along with all the extraneous subjects."

{n}突然、周りの空間があらゆる音声通信送受信装置とスピーカーから注がれる金切り声とパチパチという音で満たされる。そして、低い男の声が聞こえる。{/n}「クエリ：フォン・ヴァランシウス軌道ステーションへの招待。シャトル中央考算機への座標アップロード中…完了。目的：滅却プロトコルの完了」{n}声はしわがれ声になり、ゴボゴボという咳になる。{/n}「我が子よ、遅れるな…遅れれば、余計なものすべてと一緒に爆発することになるだろう」

languages.text: {n}L'espace autour de vous s'emplit subitement de crissements et de crépitements qui se déversent de tous les haut-parleurs et émetteurs vox. Puis, vous entendez une voix masculine grave :{/n} « Requête : invitation à se présenter sur la station orbitale des von Valancius. Transfert des coordonnées vers le cogitateur central de la navette... terminé. Objectif : achèvement de la directive Oblitération. » {n}Votre interlocuteur est pris d'une quinte de toux grasse et gutturale.{/n} « Ne tardez pas, rejeton... Dans le cas contraire, vous serez {mf|pulvérisé|pulvérisée} en même temps que tous les sujets extérieurs. »
languages.original_text: {n}The space around you suddenly fills with screeches and crackles that pour from every vox-caster and speaker. Then, you hear a deep male voice:{/n} "Query: invitation to the von Valancius orbital station. Uploading coordinates into the shuttle's central cogitator... complete. Purpose: finalising the Oblivion directive." {n}The voice goes into a guttural, gurgling cough.{/n} "Tarry not, offspring... If you delay, you will be blown up along with all the extraneous subjects."

Puis, vous entendez une voix masculine grave :{/n} « Requête : invitation à se présenter sur la station orbitale des von Valancius. Transfert des coordonnées vers le cogitateur central de la navette... terminé. Objectif : achèvement du protocole Oblitération. » {n}Votre interlocuteur est pris d'une quinte de toux grasse et gutturale.{/n} « Ne tardez pas, rejeton... Dans le cas contraire, vous serez {mf|pulvérisé|pulvérisée} en même temps que tous les sujets extérieurs. »

languages.text: {n}Etrafı aniden voksyayardan ve hoparlörden yayılan çığlıklar sarıyor. Sonrasında kalın bir erkek sesi duyuyorsun.{/n} "Sual: Von Valancius yörünge istasyonuna davet. Koordinatlar, mekiğin merkezî kavramsayarına yükleniyor... Tamamlandı. Amaç: Yıkılış talimatını tamamlamak." {n}Sesin ardından gırtlaktan gelen, derin bir öksürük duyuluyor.{/n} "Oyalanma zürriyet... Gecikirsen tüm fazlalık kimselerle birlikte sen de havaya uçarsın."

Purpose: finalising the Oblivion directive." {n}The voice goes into a guttural, gurgling cough.{/n} "Tarry not, offspring... If you delay, you will be blown up along with all the extraneous subjects."

Koordinatlar, mekiğin merkezî kavramsayarına yükleniyor... Tamamlandı. Amaç: Yıkılış talimatını tamamlamak." {n}Sesin ardından gırtlaktan gelen, derin bir öksürük duyuluyor.{/n} "Oyalanma zürriyet... {n}Etrafı aniden voksyayardan ve hoparlörden yayılan çığlıklar sarıyor. Sonrasında kalın bir erkek sesi duyuyorsun.{/n} "Sual: Von Valancius yörünge istasyonuna davet. Koordinatlar, mekiğin merkezî kavramsayarına yükleniyor... Tamamlandı. Amaç: Yıkılış protokolünü tamamlamak." {n}Sesin ardından gırtlaktan gelen, derin bir öksürük duyuluyor.{/n} "Oyalanma zürriyet... Gecikirsen tüm fazlalık kimselerle birlikte sen de havaya uçarsın."

languages.text: {n}Plötzlich ist die Luft von einem Knistern und Kreischen erfüllt, das aus allen Vox-Transmittern und Lautsprechern zu ertönen scheint. Schließlich hörst du eine tiefe Männerstimme:{/n} "Anfrage: Einladung auf die Orbitalstation derer von Valancius. Upload der Koordinaten in den Zentralcogitator des Shuttles ... abgeschlossen. Zweck: Abschluss der Vergessenheitsdirektive." {n}Die Stimme verliert sich in einem gutturalen Gurgeln.{/n} "Zaudert nicht, Sprössling ... Wenn Ihr zögert, werdet Ihr an der Seite all der belanglosen Subjekte sterben."

Then, you hear a deep male voice:{/n} "Query: invitation to the von Valancius orbital station. Uploading coordinates into the shuttle's central cogitator... complete. Purpose: finalising the Oblivion directive." {n}The voice goes into a guttural, gurgling cough.{/n} "Tarry not, offspring... If you delay, you will be blown up along with all the extraneous subjects."
